price: 124. Markuu walaalkood Huud ku yidhi: “Ma waydaan ka joogeyn (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale)?.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
